OB: Bug 38055Shell Title bar displayed when only SWT.REZISE. When I create a shell with only SWTRESIZE and on other styles I get amenu/title bar at the top.But if I resize the window the menu/title bardisappears.If seem sthe bar should not appear in the first place.public static void main(String[] args) {Shell shell = new Shell(SWT.RESIZE);shell.open();Display display = shell.getDisplay();while (!shell.isDisposed()) {if (!display.readAndDispatch()) {display.sleep();}}}
